attributes.action: Provide funding to ensure that all schools and colleges have recycling services
attributes.additional_details: With the current environmental situation it is important that individuals take action, by providing proper recycling services in schools and colleges it is a small step in the right direction towards a greener society.
attributes.background: Provide recycling services in all colleges and schools to encourage young people to dispose of their waste and rubbish properly, and help the environment

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628983
